Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Alex Arias
Dear Sir,
Alex Arias shouldn't play at AA Wichita Wranglers!
He has an AVG of .245 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Progress of Brent Mayne
Dear Sir,
Brent Mayne is hitting the ball well at AA Wichita Wranglers!
He has an AVG of .362, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/2/1993
Subject: Luis Garcia learns new position
Luis Garcia has made noteable progress
learning his new position, First Base.
I would rate his skills as "9" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director
